system.description: The true glory seekers, Knights are chivalrous to a point but have none of the Duelist's respect for battles. Knights are the weapon masters, well-armored but relying on their swift, powerful attacks and powerful strength to destroy their enemy before they can counter attack. Knights are the real behemoths of the battlefield, leading troops into the fray and slaughtering all they can. If you are a Knight be looking for glory, looking for the next powerful weapon.

overview.base:
Rallying Cry only counts as a mental effect on your enemies and a healing effect on your allies. The healing's duration is instant.
Note: People may choose to fail feat saves.

results.fail: If you consider the targeted creature to be an ally of yours, they heal. If you consider the targeted creature to be an enemy, they become frightened.

system.endCondition: At the start of each of the enemy target's turns, they roll [[/roll 2d4]]. On a 4, this effect ends.

results.fail: You and the target are vulnerable to each other.

system.endCondition: At the start of each of the target's turns, they roll [[/roll 2d4]]. If either of these dice roll a 4, this effect ends.

overview.base:
Note: A target moving due to Battle Charge can still provoke reactions like Opportunity Attack.
Note: This ability can trigger in the middle of moving. You could approach an enemy, trigger this ability, take an Opportunity Attack against them, keep moving towards them, and trigger this ability again.

results.hit: Target moves 10 feet away from you.
results.critHit: Target moves 20 feet away from you.

system.trigger: Moving at least 10 feet in a straight line towards the target and becoming adjacent to them.

overview.base: You gain Master Weapon Smith and Runic Weapons.
You are an expert blacksmith. In addition, you gain the ability to create Master Crafted weapons.
The targeted weapon becomes runic.

You wave your hand over a weapon as arcane runes appear on its surface. While you are attuned to the targeted weapon, it is runic and effects that would render it destroyed cause it to be shattered instead.
You gain Triumphant Healing Surge and Withstand.
You take the triggering damage as a body hack instead. All damage types still apply.

system.requirements: You are not body hacked.
